Package Project2

Class FireballScroll

java.lang.Object
Project2.FireballScroll
All Implemented Interfaces:
Abilities
public class FireballScroll extends Object implements Abilities
The FireballScroll class represents an ability that allows the character to cast fireballs. It implements the Abilities interface to provide methods for calculating damage. It graphical effects associated with the ability.
